attributes.action: Make the Armed Forces of this Country for the Defence of the U.K. only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Because of increasing cost of equipment
which at times has become old and asked to do tasks abroad for which it was not made to do in the first place,
lets become a pure self-defence nation
like Japan, but commit our forces to this Countries shores only. We would not have to worry about stretching out
forces to far, or become involved with
other Countries battles. We have been
an Empire once, be satisfied and face
up to it, those days of Sabre-rattling
and sending a Gun-boat up the river are
over. Lets look after after our own now. With the best now equipment for our use only and not breaking our kit
and Armed Forces in someone elses back
yard. Lets be ready for anything in our
own back yard on the grounds of cost and knowing the British are being protected.
